name: A diamond choker called 'Constellation'
data: It increases the users wisdom superbly.
It has pathetic armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration impressively.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'greater vulnerability'.
This item loses its magical powers somewhat faster than average.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'mastery of shielding'.
